price: (43) And in Thamūd, when it was said to them, "Enjoy yourselves for a time."
arabic: وَفِي ثَمُودَ إِذۡ قِيلَ لَهُمۡ تَمَتَّعُواْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٖ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wafī thamūda idh qīla lahum tamattaʿū ḥattā ḥīnin
